string.name: don_t_have_an_account_sign_up_now
string.u: Don t have an Account? Sign up now

resources.string: Your Order has been placed successfully placed !
This FoodRunner App is fully working food ordering app with the list of top Restaurants from where the user can food according to his/her taste.
Inderjeet Khatri(B.S.Anangpuria Institute of Technology and Management) along with the instructors at Internshala. They helped me a lot with the doubts.
Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
F O O D R U N N E R..
Q.1 Name of the Developer of the App?
What is FoodRunner and Why it is built ?

As a part of Summer Training Program, I was given this project to showcase my skills. This app is just to showcase my skills and thus is not an actual product.\nThis application fetches list of restaurants made available by API and further we can demonstrate food ordering from app using help of topics covered during the course.

Like I earlier said, this was just a project to showcase my skills, you have got an idea that I was a student under Internshala Training Program. My name is Harsh Narain and I created this project during 6 week online training which started from 2 Sep. I was in 5th Semester during completing this training course.
How much time did I spend everyday ?

Number of actual hours may vary upon your skills and knowledge. But however, Istructors recommends giving 10\-12 hours per week to understand the things and develop this application as a final project.
So how does this application work ?

This application simply requests the API to fetch and send the data. Restaurant list and the items delivered by them are fetched. Similarly, food ordering requests are sent to the API. User may create new acoount or login through the same idea behind it.

I was trained using already created videos and text tutorials. There were variety of test, assignments and quizzes to help me learn faster and better. And at last, this project was simply an attempt by Instructor to get hands-on practice of what did I Just learnt.
How was training delivered to me by Internshala?
